childMdx.excerpt: A  mnemonic phrase  or  mnemonic seed  is a set of typically either 12 or 24 words, which can be used to derive an infinite number of wallets. Often times these phrases are used by cryptocurrency hardware wallets, to be written down on a piece of paper by the user to safely back up the users' funds. Sometimes these are referred to as  backup phrases  or  seed phrases  or  12-word phrase  by other wallets or interfaces. In the Ethereum ecosystem, mnemonic phrases are generally generated following…
